Text:
I now have all 21 books seeded.  I hope you enjoy them as much as I do. 

Click on my name istrahd above and it will take you to a download link to all of them.

This torrent will show only 99.8% availability... After I created the torrent, my Media Player changed the Folder.jpg file. I can't for the life of me find the original version of the jpg and so it has a "missing" file.  It has absolutely nothing to do with the playability of the audiobook and if you would like a pic for the folder.jpg, just Right Click on the pic above and click Save File As... you know the routine...
